title: Terry Pratchett - Discworld 24 - The Fifth Elephant (reup)
description:
If you are looking for a quick distraction, move along...

Otherwise:
This is a partial re-upload of a much larger torrent that has recently become unavaible due to lack of seeding. Said torrent did contain nearly all of the avaible Discworld audiobooks, many of which unfortunately weren't read by Stephen Briggs.
In case you don't know: Briggs adapted many of the Discworld novels for the stage and has played several Discworld characters himself. As a result, listening to those audiobooks read by him is even more enjoyable than "just" reading the book, which is saying quite much all by itself... (and btw the only case of "audiobook >  
book" I have stumbled upon so far)
Finally, even though the audioboks can be enjoyed by themselves, I strongly recommend reading the "Watchmen"-related novels of the Discworld up to this one before.

Anyway, have fun and don't forget to show the people who made this audiobook possible some gratitude. Meaning: Buy the books and audiobooks if you like them!
